interface.name: Wv
interface.summary: Wv: wv is a library which allows access to Microsoft Word files
interface.description:
wv is a library which allows access to Microsoft Word files. It can load and parse Word 2000, 97, 95 and 6 file formats. (These are the file formats known internally as Word 9, 8, 7 and 6.) There is some support for reading earlier formats as well: Word 2 docs are converted to plaintext.
Provided with the wv distribution is an application called wvWare. wvWare is a "power-user" application with lots of command-line options, doo-dads, bells, and whistles. Less interesting, but more convenient, are the helper scripts that use wvWare. These are: •wvHtml: convert your Word document into HTML4.0 •wvLatex: convert your Word document into visually (pretty) correct LaTeX •wvCleanLatex: convert into 'cleaner' LaTeX containing less visual mark-up, more suitable for further use and LyX import. Work in progress •wvDVI: converts word to DVI. Requires 'latex' •wvPS: converts word to PostScript. Requires 'dvips' •wvPDF: converts word to Adobe PDF. Requires 'distill' from Adobe [Someone do a pdflatex or pdfhtml version :-)] •wvText: converts word to plain text. Textually correct output requires 'lynx.' For poor output, this doesn't require anything special. •wvAbw: converts word to Abiword format. (Far better just to use Abiword.) •wvWml: converts word to WML for viewing on portable devices like WebPhones and Palm Pilots. •wvRtf: a basic version exists •wvMime: can be plugged as a MIME helper application into your browser/mail client; presents the document on-screen inside GhostView, while all intermediate files generated go into the /tmp directory.

entry-point.name: wvAbw
entry-point.summary: wvAbw: convert msword documents to Abiword's format
entry-point.description: wvAbw converts Word documents into Abiword's native format.

entry-point.name: wvCleanLatex
entry-point.summary: wvCleanLatex: convert msword documents to LaTeX
entry-point.description: wvCleanLatex converts word documents into LaTeX that looks like it'd been hand-edited

entry-point.name: wvDVI
entry-point.summary: wvDVI: convert msword documents to DVI
entry-point.description: wvDVI converts word documents into DVI documents. REQUIREMENTS wvLatex latex

entry-point.name: wvHtml
entry-point.summary: wvHtml: convert msword documents to html
entry-point.description: wvHtml converts word documents into W3C certified HTML4.0 format.

entry-point.name: wvLatex
entry-point.summary: wvLatex: convert msword documents to LaTeX
entry-point.description: wvLatex converts word documents into LaTeX

entry-point.name: wvMime
entry-point.description: wvMime will view your word documents using ggv,gv,ghostview,etc... instead of acting as a conver- sion engine.

entry-point.name: wvPDF
entry-point.summary: wvPDF: convert msword documents to PDF
entry-point.description: wvPDF converts word documents into Adobe's PDF format. REQUIREMENTS wvPS distill

entry-point.name: wvPS
entry-point.summary: wvPS: convert msword documents to PS
entry-point.description: wvPS converts word documents into PS (Postscript) for- mat. You can then use the PS version to print, view using gv, ggv,ghostview,etc.. REQUIREMENTS wvDVI dvips

entry-point.name: WvRTF
entry-point.summary: WvRTF: convert msword documents to RTF
entry-point.description: wvRTF converts word documents into RTF (Rich Text For- mat). wvRTF is experimental. REQUIREMENTS wvDVI dvips

entry-point.name: wvSummary
entry-point.summary: wvSummary: view word document's summary info
entry-point.description: wvSummary displays the summary info included in all MSWord documents. This often includes the Author, time created, etc...

entry-point.name: wvText
entry-point.summary: wvText: converts word to plain text.
entry-point.description: Textually correct output requires 'lynx.' For poor output, this doesn't require anything special.

entry-point.name: wvVersion
entry-point.description: wvVersion displays the word version number of a MSWord document. 8=Word97, 7=Word95, ...

entry-point.name: wvWare
entry-point.description: wvWare converts word documents into other formats such as PS,PDF,HTML,LaTeX,DVI,ABW

entry-point.name: wvWml
entry-point.summary: wvWml: convert msword documents to WML
entry-point.description: wvWml converts word documents into WML, suitable for viewing on PDAs such as web-phones.
